title: PINSPARK Long Sleeve Polo Shirts for Men Moisture Wicking Golf Shirts Quick Dry Work Hiking Casual Collared Shirt
description: 【Lightweight & Breathable】：The mens long sleeve polo are made of 100%polyester, Quick dry, lightweight and breathable fabric.and very soft so you can wear them all day long, it can stay cool and dry all the day in spring, summe, autumn.
【Classic Design】：The collar and 3-button placket feature a custom fit, and wrinkle-resistant fabric ensures you can tuck them in without wrinkling, while being fade-resistant for long-lasting use.
【Sun Protection】：Mens polo shirts fabric in addition to breathable, also have sun protection. it can prevent your skin from the UPF 50+, UV rays, protects your skin from sunburn in summer.
【Occasions】Our mens polo shirts perfect for golf, daily wear, work wear, camping, climbing, hiking, travelling, walking, fishing tennis and casual...
【Note】：Our polo shirts size is small, it is recommended to choose one size larger to buy. If you have any questions, please contact us in any time, we will reply your message as soon as possible.
